firstDeployment.description: True if the application should be treated as if it is deployed for the first time

gitURL.description: The url of the HCP git to which we should push in order to deploy

isGitUrlAlive.description: True if the git repo on HCP is still active and it's not deleted. This is to be used in order to know if the git repo was deleted from HCP when the application was deleted

useHCPForSCAndDeployment.description: Is HCP git used for both source control and deployment or is the source control managed in another git repo

HCPAppName.description: In case the application is already deployed and the application still exists on HCP, this is the application name on HCP

returns.description: An object that describes the case of the deployment
